tool_description:
Easily create interactive SMS applications anywhere in the world.  At the core of TextIt lies our exclusive Flow engine. With Flows, anybody can set up or modify a complex SMS application without the need of a programmer or expensive consulting company.
Using a basic Android phone, you can launch your application instantly in any country while avoiding expensive set-up costs or external technical support.
name: TextIt
title: TextIt

api_list.name: Claim Relayers
api_list.description: You can associate a new Android relayer to your account by sending a POST request to this URL with the following JSON data:
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-textit.p.rapidapi.com/relayers.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-textit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sending Messages
api_list.description: You can create new messages by making a POST request to this URL with the following JSON data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-textit.p.rapidapi.com/sms.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-textit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
